XrdRewardLimit.title: XRD Reward Limit Reached
XrdRewardLimit.content: To claim more rewards, you will need to contact RadQuest support:

CannotClaimRewards.title: You are currently blocked
CannotClaimRewards.content: While you are blocked, you cannot claim quest rewards or make use of Jetty’s RadMorph creation features.

AccountAlreadyRegistered.title: Account Already Registered
AccountAlreadyRegistered.content: You seem to be already a RadQuest user - please log in with the Persona you originally used to continue.

HighDemand.title: RadQuest is experiencing very high demand.
HighDemand.content: Your request is still in progress, but you may need to come back later.

PermanentlyBlocked.title: Account Suspended
PermanentlyBlocked.content: There was suspicious activity on this login and you can no longer receive rewards and certain features may not work.

SessionBlocked.title: Suspicious Activity
SessionBlocked.content: Your connection location has unusual activity. For this login, you won't be able to claim rewards or use many of RadQuest's features.

GetOffVPN.title: VPN Detected
GetOffVPN.content: To continue claiming rewards and using all of RadQuest's features, try turning off any VPN software you may be using.

NetworkCongestion.title: RadQuest is experiencing very high demand.
NetworkCongestion.content: If you have problems completing quests or making claims, please try again later.

GoldenTicket.title: You've scanned a golden ticket!
GoldenTicket.content: To claim your ticket, please log out and back in again.
